Apr 4, 2016

This week in Products ( March 28 — April 3)

This is the 9th edition of This week in Products — a series of posts featuring a collection of my favorite products on Product Hunt each week.

March 28

Kuvée — A smart Wi-Fi connected wine bottle with a touchscreen.
Zuo Charge — World’s smallest key ring charger for iOS & Android.
Inslip — An elastic strap for any phone or tablet.
Career Cache — The best tools and resources to help you get a better job.
Hemingboard — Puns, synonyms, rhymes in your keyboard.

March 29

Summize — Get a summary of virtually anything in seconds.
Ringly Aries — A smart bracelet paired with your phone.
Pistol Lake — Ultra-functional activewear for minimalists.
Bump — All In One — Wall plug, power bank, premium cable & holder.
Koncept — Usability testing, interactive prototypes & metrics.
Raden — Smart travel bag for smart travelers.

March 30

Billy — Keep track of your subscriptions.
Build with Square — Create your perfect commerce solution on Square’s platform.
Dear Apple — A letter generator & gallery for expedited App Store reviews.
Website Builders — All the tools you need to build your dream project.
fitbod — Train smarter with real-time workout routines.
Slides Framework — We make it impossible to create ugly websites.
Microsoft Bot Framework — Your bots, wherever your users are talking.

March 31

Abot — Build your own digital assistant.
StackPile — Install 3rd party apps on your website in seconds.
Priime Styles — Modern photo presets for Mac.
Juicero — The first at-home, cold-press juicing system.
Son of a Tailor — Tailormade t-shirts crafted to your body measurements.

April 1

Tesla Model 3 — The mass market electric car by Tesla is here.
Patternator — Create cool, custom cases for your iPhone.
Appsmonk — Get in-app chat for your mobile app in 10 minutes.
BOXFOX — Custom gift boxes, hand-wrapped w/ hand-written notes.
Modstock — Modern stock photography for the lives we really live.

April 2

Levels Theme — A customizable landing page for product launches.
Self-Driving RV — The world’s first fully autonomous RV.
Robin — Put your lawn on autopilot.
Zoom.ai — Intelligent assistants for the enterprise.
Image Blur — JS Image blurring background plugin.

April 3

How Many of Me — See how many people share your name in the U.S.
Estimatr — Build accurate software estimates.
Hipstersound — Create a productive atmosphere at home.
Homeppl Rental Resume — The world’s first digital rental resume.
Kixify — The world’s largest sneaker marketplace.

Let me know your favorite hunts on Product Hunt from last week.

Until next week, Au Revoir!
